keywords: ['chinese fiddle', 'oriental song', 'no voice', 'instrumental', 'meditation song', 'bells and chimes', 'dreamy song', 'bass', 'no percussion', 'ambient background', 'slow tempo']
caption: This instrumental song features a Chinese fiddle. The song has an oriental feel. The fiddle is accompanied by a bass playing the root notes of the chords. Another medium pitched instrument plays chords in the background. Bells and chimes are played to add more melody to this song. There is no percussion in this song. There are no voices in this song. This song can be played in a meditation center.
